name: ftp

proxyuser.description: When required by a proxy server, a valid username.

failifexists.description: throw a error if local file already exist or overwrite it

stoponerror.description: define if execution halt on error or not

connection.description: the name for the connection, used to cache the connection

proxyport.description:
The port number on the proxy server from which the object is requested. Default is 80. When 
	used with resolveURL, the URLs of retrieved documents that specify a port number are automatically 
	resolved to preserve links in the retrieved document.

asciiextensionlist.description: Delimited list of file extensions that force ASCII transfer mode, if transferMode = "auto".

proxypassword.description: When required by a proxy server, a valid password.

existing.description: source or existing file or directory to rename

new.description: new name for file or directory

action.description: the action that should be execute

proxyserver.description: Host name or IP address of a proxy server.

name.description: name of the query for list directory

description: Lets users implement File Transfer Protocol (FTP) operations.
